fundamentalAnalysis.title: Fundamental Analysis
fundamentalAnalysis.description: At Forex Fundamental Edge, The Fundamental attribution error is a cognitive bias where individuals tend to overemphasize personality traits when explaining the behavior of others, while underemphasizing situational factors that might have influenced their actions. In simpler terms, we often assume others are acting the way they do because of who they are, rather than because of circumstances beyond their control.

technicalAnalysis.title: Technical Analysis
technicalAnalysis.description: Technical analysis in forex trading involves studying price charts and using statistical indicators to determine future currency price movements.

news.description: At {highlight}, we bring you the latest market-moving news and events that impact currency trading. Stay informed with our curated selection of important financial news, economic indicators, and market analysis from trusted sources worldwide.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Empowering traders with comprehensive market insights and professional trading tools

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description: At Forex Fundamental Edge, our mission is to democratize access to professional-grade forex trading insights and tools. We believe that every trader, regardless of experience level, deserves access to the same high-quality fundamental and technical analysis that institutional traders rely on.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: We provide comprehensive forex trading solutions that combine cutting-edge technology with deep market expertise. Our platform offers:

features.fundamentalAnalysis: Advanced fundamental analysis tools including COT reports, economic calendars, and currency strength indicators
features.technicalIndicators: Professional technical analysis tools with real-time market data and customizable indicators
features.marketInsights: Daily market insights, news analysis, and expert commentary from seasoned traders
features.educationalResources: Comprehensive educational resources to help traders improve their skills and knowledge

expertise.title: Expert Analysis
expertise.description: Our team of professional analysts brings years of experience in forex markets and institutional trading.

realTime.title: Real-time Data
realTime.description: Access to live market data, real-time indicators, and instant market updates to stay ahead of the curve.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Tools
comprehensive.description: All-in-one platform with both fundamental and technical analysis tools in one integrated solution.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Dedicated customer support team available around the clock to assist with any questions or issues.

ourTeam.title: Our Team
ourTeam.description: Our diverse team of analysts, developers, and financial experts work together to provide you with the most accurate and actionable trading insights. With decades of combined experience in forex markets, we understand what it takes to succeed in this dynamic environment.
